1.0.0.name: wordpress/wp-categ-menu
1.0.0.description:
Description: Widget/shortcodes menu(list or select field) based on posts categories/pages(also for custom post types and custom taxonomies). You can display subcategories(one level) and configure CSS, with optional jquery dropdown effect. Based on Sample Hello World Plugin 2 (http://lonewolf-online.net/) by Tim Trott(http://lonewolf-online.net/) and WP e-Commerce Featured Product by Zorgbargle | Phenomenoodle http://www.phenomenoodle.com

More info about the plugin:http://www.wpworking.com/
